v
.
Proceeds of Life Insurance Policies Received After December 9, 2004
Under
PL 108-454
, do not count the lump sum proceeds of a life insurance policy on a Veteran who dies after December 9, 2004.

:Â  For more information on this exclusion, see

title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
